page.title: 16QUESTIONNAIRE
page.content: Those asked to complete the survey were the families of pupils at Birkdale & Greenbank High Schools.The majority said they like living in the area because of the amenities & because the environment is pleasant,quiet clean.They did complain that the landscape is too flat & the beaches are polluted by dogs & motor vehicles.Changes they would like to see include more sports facilities & better kept roads. 72% of the families said they belong to a club with sports clubs being the most popular & political societies the least.Leisure activities centre around the family;the most popular activities are watching television,playing ball games & swimming. 60-70% said they visit the theatre,cinema,concerts,dances,pubs,
